description: This is a drop-in meetup at a public venue; space is not guaranteed. Join us for a relaxed evening in Hong Kong. No presentations. No pitches. No panels. A low-key meetup for crypto people who d rather grab a drink and have real conversations traders, investors, developers, builders, and friends in town for Consensus Hong Kong. Hosted by members of the Wild Goat Coin community and open to anyone active or curious
